mapper.insert: INSERT INTO matchdto ( gameId, queueId, gameType, gameDuration, platformId, gameCreation, seasonId, gameVersion, mapId, gameMode ) values ( #{gameId}, #{queueId}, #{gameType}, #{gameDuration}, #{platformId}, #{gameCreation}, #{seasonId}, #{gameVersion}, #{mapId}, #{gameMode} )

INSERT INTO playerdto ( gameId, participantId, profileIcon, accountId, matchHistoryUri, currentAccountId, currentPlatformId, summonerName, summonerId, platformId ) values ( #{gameId}, #{participantId}, #{profileIcon}, #{accountId}, #{matchHistoryUri}, #{currentAccountId}, #{currentPlatformId}, #{summonerName}, #{summonerId}, #{platformId} )

INSERT INTO teamstatsdto ( gameId, towerKills, riftHeraldKills, firstBlood, inhibitorKills, firstBaron, firstDragon, dominionVictoryScore, dragonKills, firstInhibitor, firstTower, vilemawKills, firstRiftHerald, teamId, win ) values ( #{gameId}, #{towerKills}, #{riftHeraldKills}, #{firstBlood}, #{inhibitorKills}, #{firstBaron}, #{firstDragon}, #{dominionVictoryScore}, #{dragonKills}, #{firstInhibitor}, #{firstTower}, #{vilemawKills}, #{firstRiftHerald}, #{teamId}, #{win} )
INSERT INTO teambansdto ( gameId, teamId, championId, pickTurn ) values ( #{gameId}, #{teamId}, #{championId}, #{pickTurn} )

INSERT INTO participantdto ( gameId, participantId, championId, teamId, spell1Id, spell2Id, highestAchievedSeasonTier ) values ( #{gameId}, #{participantId}, #{championId}, #{teamId}, #{spell1Id}, #{spell2Id}, #{highestAchievedSeasonTier} )
INSERT INTO runedto ( gameId, participantId, runeId, rank ) values ( #{gameId}, #{participantId}, #{runeId}, #{rank} )

INSERT INTO participantstatsdto ( gameId, item0, item1, totalUnitsHealed, item2, largestMultiKill, goldEarned, firstInhibitorKill, physicalDamageTaken, nodeNeutralizeAssist, totalPlayerScore, champLevel, damageDealtToObjectives, totalDamageTaken, neutralMinionsKilled, deaths, tripleKills, magicDamageDealtToChampions, wardsKilled, pentaKills, damageSelfMtigated, largestCriticalStrike, nodeNeutralize, totalTimeCrowdControlDealt, firstTowerKill, magicDamageDealt, totalScoreRank, nodeCapture, wardsPlaced, totalDamageDealt, timeCCingOthers, magicalDamageTaken, largestKillingSpree, totalDamageDealtToChampions, physicalDamageDealtToChampions, neutralMinionsKilledTeamJungle, totalMinionsKilled, firstInhibitorAssist, visionWardsBoughtInGame, objectivePlayerScore, kills, firstTowerAssist, combatPlayerScore, inhibitorKills, turretKills, participantId, trueDamageTaken, firstBloodAssist, nodeCaptureAssist, assists, teamObjective, altarsNeutralized, goldSpent, damageDealtToTurrets, altarsCaptured, win, totalHeal, unrealKills, visionScore, physicalDamageDealt, firstBloodKill, longestTimeSpentLiving, killingSprees, sightWardsBoughtInGame, trueDamageDealtToChampions, neutralMinionsKilledEnemyJungle, doubleKills, trueDamageDealt, quadraKills, item4, item3, item6, item5, playerScore0, playerScore1, playerScore2, playerScore3, playerScore4, playerScore5, playerScore6, playerScore7, playerScore8, playerScore9, perk0, perk0Var1, perk0Var2, perk0Var3, perk1, perk1Var1, perk1Var2, perk1Var3, perk2, perk2Var1, perk2Var2, perk2Var3, perk3, perk3Var1, perk3Var2, perk3Var3, perk4, perk4Var1, perk4Var2, perk4Var3, perk5, perk5Var1, perk5Var2, perk5Var3, perkPrimaryStyle, perkSubStyle, statPerk0, statPerk1, statPerk2 ) values ( #{gameId}, #{item0}, #{item1}, #{totalUnitsHealed}, #{item2}, #{largestMultiKill}, #{goldEarned}, #{firstInhibitorKill}, #{physicalDamageTaken}, #{nodeNeutralizeAssist}, #{totalPlayerScore}, #{champLevel}, #{damageDealtToObjectives}, #{totalDamageTaken}, #{neutralMinionsKilled}, #{deaths}, #{tripleKills}, #{magicDamageDealtToChampions}, #{wardsKilled}, #{pentaKills}, #{damageSelfMtigated}, #{largestCriticalStrike}, #{nodeNeutralize}, #{totalTimeCrowdControlDealt}, #{firstTowerKill}, #{magicDamageDealt}, #{totalScoreRank}, #{nodeCapture}, #{wardsPlaced}, #{totalDamageDealt}, #{timeCCingOthers}, #{magicalDamageTaken}, #{largestKillingSpree}, #{totalDamageDealtToChampions}, #{physicalDamageDealtToChampions}, #{neutralMinionsKilledTeamJungle}, #{totalMinionsKilled}, #{firstInhibitorAssist}, #{visionWardsBoughtInGame}, #{objectivePlayerScore}, #{kills}, #{firstTowerAssist}, #{combatPlayerScore}, #{inhibitorKills}, #{turretKills}, #{participantId}, #{trueDamageTaken}, #{firstBloodAssist}, #{nodeCaptureAssist}, #{assists}, #{teamObjective}, #{altarsNeutralized}, #{goldSpent}, #{damageDealtToTurrets}, #{altarsCaptured}, #{win}, #{totalHeal}, #{unrealKills}, #{visionScore}, #{physicalDamageDealt}, #{firstBloodKill}, #{longestTimeSpentLiving}, #{killingSprees}, #{sightWardsBoughtInGame}, #{trueDamageDealtToChampions}, #{neutralMinionsKilledEnemyJungle}, #{doubleKills}, #{trueDamageDealt}, #{quadraKills}, #{item4}, #{item3}, #{item6}, #{item5}, #{playerScore0}, #{playerScore1}, #{playerScore2}, #{playerScore3}, #{playerScore4}, #{playerScore5}, #{playerScore6}, #{playerScore7}, #{playerScore8}, #{playerScore9}, #{perk0}, #{perk0Var1}, #{perk0Var2}, #{perk0Var3}, #{perk1}, #{perk1Var1}, #{perk1Var2}, #{perk1Var3}, #{perk2}, #{perk2Var1}, #{perk2Var2}, #{perk2Var3}, #{perk3}, #{perk3Var1}, #{perk3Var2}, #{perk3Var3}, #{perk4}, #{perk4Var1}, #{perk4Var2}, #{perk4Var3}, #{perk5}, #{perk5Var1}, #{perk5Var2}, #{perk5Var3}, #{perkPrimaryStyle}, #{perkSubStyle}, #{statPerk0}, #{statPerk1}, #{statPerk2} )

INSERT INTO participanttimelinedto ( gameId, participantId, csDiffPerMinDeltas damageTakenPerMinDeltas, role, damageTakenDiffPerMinDeltas, xpPerMinDeltas, xpDiffPerMinDeltas, lane, creepsPerMinDeltas, goldPerMinDeltas ) values ( #{gameId}, #{participantId}, #{csDiffPerMinDeltas} #{damageTakenPerMinDeltas}, #{role}, #{damageTakenDiffPerMinDeltas}, #{xpPerMinDeltas}, #{xpDiffPerMinDeltas}, #{lane}, #{creepsPerMinDeltas}, #{goldPerMinDeltas} )
INSERT INTO masterydto ( gameId, participantId, rank, masteryId ) values ( #{gameId}, #{participantId}, #{rank}, #{masteryId} )
